ygData.subject: RE: Dragon kit goodies (was:RE: Nagafen 2; Sylly 0)
ygData.msgSnippet: John, These drop in Castle Mistmoore at night when you re camping the Mistmoore Battle Drums.  In a three hour camp we accumulated probably four or five
ygData.messageBody:
John,

These drop in Castle Mistmoore at night when you're camping the Mistmoore
Battle Drums. In a three hour camp we accumulated probably four or five
werewolf claws.

Crier

> The only werewolf claw my guild has gotten came from a WK
> werewolf too (for the lupine claw gauntlets quest).
> Unfortunately, we didn't know at the time how rare these were
> (we got it on the first werewolf we ever killed), and traded
> the gauntlets away. I've killed over 50 werewolves since, and
> not seen another one.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
